Header: Loans released to 715 entrepreneurs under Thurunu Diriya
Content: Loans have so far been released to 715 entrepreneurs through the “Thurunu Diriya” Enterprise Loan Scheme. This “Thurunu Diriya” loan scheme has been implemented with the intention of further strengthening the national economy by upgrading the small scale young entrepreneurs. It is being implemented by the Bank of Ceylon under the Enterprise Sri Lanka programme. A sum of 294 million rupees had already been issued to 715 entrepreneurs.  The highest number of loans had been issued to entrepreneurs within the Western and Sabaragamuwa Provinces. This loan scheme is being implemented with the mediation of all the Divisional and District Secretariats.
